name: phonebook-backend
description: This repo contains my backend homework submissions for the Fullstack Open 2021 course.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen2021/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../fullstackopen2021-backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Marley Alford
